subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The team lost to the Padres despite three homers by Lucas Duda and then had to rebut reports that a deal had been made to send Wilmer Flores and Zack Wheeler to the Brewers for Carlos Gomez.
snippet: The team lost to the Padres despite three homers by Lucas Duda and then had to rebut reports that a deal had been made to send Wilmer Flores and Zack Wheeler to the Brewers for Carlos Gomez.
